description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Real time strategy shoot 'em up.  Pilot any unit.  Blast away enemies in a tank or take the role of an engineer to build an army, including massive boss units. Team up with your friends and play cooperatively or take them on in skirmish or micro battles.
description.short: Real time strategy shoot 'em up.  Pilot any unit.  Blast away enemies in a tank or take the role of an engineer to build an army, including massive boss units. Team up with your friends and play cooperatively or take them on in skirmish or micro battles.
